Title: Disallows the suspension or revocation of a domestic violence victim's driver's license or registration for non-payment or lapse of insurance coverage
Summary: Disallows the suspension or revocation of a domestic violence victim's driver's license or registration for non-payment or lapse of insurance coverage upon a proper showing of current insurance and a court order or attorney affirmation that such individual is in fact a victim of domestic violence.
LawCode: Amd ยง318, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to disallowing suspension or revocation of a domestic violence victim's driver's license or registration for non-payment or lapse of insurance coverage
